attributes.action: Stop telephone companies raising charges during the contract period
attributes.background: Currently telephone providers are allowed to raise prices annually for Retail Price Index plus 3.9%. This should be stopped immediately with the companies honouring the agreed terms when the contract was entered into

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a contractual decision for people taking out a phone contract and their provider.
